channel.title: Yell
channel.description:
[code] yell("[" + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));;[/code]
I want to make it so that it is like [Player]: hello
I cant add the ], it keeps giving me errors. Can anyone help where to put it?

item.title: Yell
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

here just use mine

Code:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Regular] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
            }
	if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Frank")) {
                titles = "[OWNER]";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]</blockquote>

I would like to use this code but it gives me 100 errors… what can i do?

Read full topic

item.title: Yell
item.dc:creator: @baby_kid13 baby_kid13
item.description:
@baby_kid13 wrote:

Okay heres what i have its configured for delta tho so yeh but here goes nothing it worked for me hope for you too

if (command.startsWith("yell")) {
}
if (playerRights == 0) {
	String message = command.substring(4);
	yell(" [" + playerName + "]: "+message+"");
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
	String message = command.substring(4);
	yell("[Moderator " + playerName + "]: "+message+"");
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
	String message = command.substring(4);
	yell("[Administrator " + playerName + "]: "+message+"");
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Lmao")) {
	String message = command.substring(4);
	yell("[Owner " + playerName + "]: "+message+"");
}

Read full topic

item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

You could use this that I just made, it would probably work but not sure, if you get an error post it

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("yell")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [" + playerName + "]: " + command.substring(5); }

item.title: Yell
item.dc:creator: @baby_kid13 baby_kid13
item.description:
@baby_kid13 wrote:

Okay i doubt its gonna work but i just edited his code try this dont blame me if it dont work

if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights >= 0) {
                String titles = "";

                if (playerRights == 0) {
                    titles = "[Player] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 1) {
                    titles = "[Moderator] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 2) {
                    titles = "[Admin] ";
                }
                if (playerRights == 3) {
                    titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
                }
		if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Frank")) {
                    titles = "[OWNER]";
                }
                yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                        + command.substring(5));
        }
